interface.name: agent.world.Fire
interface.description: This element represents a fire (in Sword, two different fire models are used punctual fires, and surface fires). A fire can be extinguished by specific units. A 'Fire' object has a life time cycle (increase and decrease rate depending on a combustion energy ).

method.name: isExtinguished
method.description: Returns true once this entity is extinguished.

method.name: extinguishIt
method.description: An agent's physical ability to extinguish this 'Fire' object.

return.description: Returns true once action completion is done.

method.name: canBeExtinguished
method.description: Returns true if this entity can be extinguished by agent Unit.

method.name: getPositionToExtinguish
method.description: Returns an adapted reachable position allowing the agent to extinguish this element.
